column5: If you're looking for a small table saw this is a good deal and I picked one up for myself today. $500 on sale for $300 and in my experience Dewalt is a quality product https://www.canadiantire.ca/en/pdp/dewalt-compact-jobsite-table-saw-with-site-pro-modular-guarding-system-10-in-0556909p.html#srp
I run the same saw, works great for everything I've done with it.
cdn tire sure puts on some good sales
Cdn Tire will always put the majority of power tools / and tools on sale for a great price at some point. Watch the ads leading up to any projects you might have. Have fun Lew!!
